original_title: 娘の彼氏に抱かれた私。 無理矢理押し倒されたあの日からヤリまくった話
overview: My beloved daughter, Mika, who loved her husband who left, said that there was someone she wanted to introduce to me, and brought Hiroshi. Five years older than Mika, he was a wonderful person from my point of view. However, as if he could see through me in the drought of manhood, he violently hugged me and kissed me. He hates his body, which reacts even though he knows it's absolutely useless, and feels frustrated.
title: I Got Fucked by My Daughter's Boyfriend. Ever Since That Day He Banged Me, We've Been Fucking Like Crazy Ever Since Hijiri Maihara
